block.enchantinginfuser.enchanting_infus: Choose, modify and remove enchantments for your gear.
gui.enchantinginfuser.enchantment.toolti: Further increasing the level for this enchantment requires an infuser with more enchanting power.
Modifying the level for this enchantment requires an infuser with more enchanting power.
This enchantment is too powerful for an infuser with such little enchanting power.
gui.enchantinginfuser.infusing.tooltip.e: Place more bookshelves in a square around the infuser on up to two layers.
